services.title: Services
services.ogDescription: We design custom software development services for companies with technology needs of any degree of complexity and timelines of any demand.
hero: we design custom software development services for companies with technology needs of any degree of complexity and timelines of any demand
banner: so our services cover all phases of the software life cycle
Our methodologies provide the greatest possible flexibility while keeping deliverables, timelines and costs under control
phases: Our solutions begin with a preliminary study of the challenges and objectives to be met. This will be the starting point for the success of the project.
Based on what we discover, we create amazing web and mobile experiences involving data management, big data, blockchain and artificial intelligence.
At the end of development we offer maintenance and support services for a successful stabilization and transfer of the platform.

title: A SUM OF

banner.text: Divided by areas, but interconnected through well-defined processes, we integrate a robust engineering team capable of operating at breakneck speeds.

analysis.title: ANALYSIS
analysis.text: They are in charge of orchestrating the capturing methodology, analyzing the requirements and communicating to the production areas of the company.

design.title: DESIGN
design.text: They create and standardize digital artifacts according to best practices that collaborate in the collection methodology and requirements analysis.

development.title: DEVELOPMENT

quality.title: QUALITY
quality.text: They ensure that software features meet defined specifications or exceed expectations.

industries.intro: We keep up with evolving trends and technologies that impact digital changes and offer opportunities depending on the type of company.
industries.catalogTitle: Each idea requires a custom solution
industries.catalogDescription: Learn more about how we help other businesses related to your industry.

catalogItems.title: Healthcare & Wellness
catalogItems.description: We create innovative solutions by incorporating safe technologies into the provision of medical services and personal well-being.

catalogItems.title: Logistics
catalogItems.description: We modernize services that help our clients meet requirements, reduce costs, increase efficiency and deliver Mission Critical results.

catalogItems.title: Data Analytics
catalogItems.description: We build and connect flexible, scalable, and elastic data intelligence experiences to give certainty to business decisions.

catalogItems.title: Hospitality
catalogItems.description: We help our customers gain a competitive advantage by enriching their customer experience and improving their operational efficiency.

catalogItems.title: Ecommerce
catalogItems.description: We develop solutions on the cloud that not just optimize sales operations, but also delight customers and promote brand adoption.

catalogItems.title: Entrepreneurship
catalogItems.description: We prototype, validate, and build scalable MVPs, minimizing risks and maximizing returns. We accompany the entrepreneur on his long journey.

catalogItems.title: Web3
catalogItems.description: We design creative and innovative decentralized solutions for public and private protocols of the new internet.

catalogItems.title: Process Innovation
catalogItems.description: We transform business, we produce enterprise-level, efficient and, powerful implementations.

paragraph: We have been providing software engineering services from
our headquarters in Ensenada, Baja California, Mexico
since January 2014.

discovery.title: Discovery
hero: analysis of needs and objectives to
define the best route, as well as its scope.
bannerTitle: We use a couple of specialized

summary.title: We create an initial prototype
paragraph: We create an initial prototype of the software in the form of a
collection of artifacts, allowing stakeholders to make informed
decisions on the path to follow to obtain new
business capabilities or optimize processes, all this with an
agile technology project ready to be executed.

rapid.title: RAPID PROTOTYPING
paragraph: It helps us to offer constant deliveries of a prototype, with the views and
scenarios that constitute the software solution, maximizing
time.

adhoc.title: AD-HOC DISCOVERY
paragraph: We develop a customized plan, involving one or more requirements
analysis and prototyping techniques that clarify the path for the
business and in many cases propose a viable path for the
implementation of the solution.

title: Agile
development
hero: Our main service offers iteration of work by
charge of designing the architecture and
building the solution of the software from
the ideation to the end of the lifecycle.
intro: Our projects are based on iterations that include three phases: DEFINITION,
Iterations are put into a FIXED GANTT CHART that provides flexibility and
predictability in deliverables, timeline and resources.
intro2: We organize our team in DEFINITION and IMPLEMENTATION groups
using our custom methodology that is supported over different production-tested techniques for
requirement analysis, user-interface design, versioning, code architecture, and delivery.
At the end of the implementation, the result is delivered to our clients in proper staging environments
so they can perform their ACCEPTANCE tests. We accomplish this through proprietary versioning mechanisms

maad.title: MAAD
maad.par1: We created the Analysis and Design Agile Methodology, a collection of activities that allows us to capture the stakeholders' requirements and transform them into a backlog with short, clear, concise and actionable elements.
maad.par2: The methodology standardizes the collecting of requirements and process them into entities like epics, stories and deltas that clearly describe the changes to be implemented.
maad.par3: Each backlog element has a strict but simplified state that can be monitored using tools like Jira and Confluence.

flare.title: flare
flare.par: We employ a proprietary design system that allows for a fast inception and efficient implementation of interfaces with perfect grids and consistent styles since the first iteration. Flare defines clear and implementable concepts on four key points: style, structure, user interface and content.

scrum.title: scrum
scrum.par: The use of Scrum as a framework allows us to approach complex problems while valuable, continuous and constant deliveries are done in a creative manner and focused on increasing team productivity. Based on the CMMI model, we implement good practices that allow us to increase and optimize performance of the processes directly and indirectly involved in software development, maximizing opportunities and mitigating risks.

agile.title: agile flow
agile.par: We design robust and flexible proprietary versioning mechanisms, compatible with industry standards. These processes, combined with our continuous integration mechanisms, allow us to reach maximum development speeds while maintaining total control of the quality of each of the components involved and their integrations.

cd.title: cd/ci
par: Our source code is managed using proprietary continuous integration infrastructure that automates binary versioning, packaging and release.
The entire automation of our DevOps processes allows us to deliver functional versions to our clients at the end of each iteration.

span.forward: AGILE MAINTENANCE, SCOPE DEV. & CONTINUOUS SUPPORT

title: WE USE KANBAN
AS AN AGILE FRAMEWORK
par: We employ Kanban as an agile workframe to prioritize and organize planned and on-call work,
which allows us to maintain a constant flow of deliverables, through the implementation of
solutions that immediately provide value to the client.

stories.title: Work
stories.ogDescription: From startups to enterprises, we've helped drive growth and innovation through custom software development. Explore our success stories.

understanding your needs
